part.instruction: Click on the given reference point ( ● ), and drag out arrows to represent the various forces acting on this box sliding down an inclined plane. That is, create a Free Body Diagram. Click on the SUBMIT button to check your answer.
part.correct: Click on the NEXT button to proceed.

part.instruction: Drag the arrows into the box to resolve the Free Body Diagram . Click on the SUBMIT button to check your answer.
part.correct: Click on the NEXT button to proceed to the next exercise.

part.instruction: From the information given, which formula would you use to find the unknown (?). Select a formula and click on the SUBMIT button to check your answer.
part.correct: Click on the NEXT button to proceed to the next exercise.
